solution_line_template: Matt spent on math and science {math_percentage_value}% + {science_percentage_value}% = {combined_percentage_value}% of the time.

This means he did homework from these two subjects for {combined_percentage_fraction} * {total_homework_minutes} minutes = <<{combined_percentage_fraction}*{total_homework_minutes}={time_on_math_science}>>{time_on_math_science} minutes.

So Matt spent {total_homework_minutes} minutes - {time_on_math_science} minutes = <<{total_homework_minutes}-{time_on_math_science}={time_on_other_subjects}>>{time_on_other_subjects} minutes doing homework from other subjects.
